dashboard.description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/1662372623 at Fri Oct  8 13:01:19 UTC 2021

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  topk by (queue) (1, sum(rate(sidekiq_running_jobs{environment="$environment", type="sidekiq", stage="$stage", queue=~"$queue"}[$__range])) by (queue, urgency)),
  "urgency", "unknown", "urgency", ""
)

label_replace(
  topk by (queue) (1, sum(rate(sidekiq_running_jobs{environment="$environment", type="sidekiq", stage="$stage", queue=~"$queue"}[$__range])) by (queue, feature_category)),
  "feature_category", "unknown", "feature_category", ""
)

label_replace(
  topk by (queue) (1, sum(rate(sidekiq_running_jobs{environment="$environment", type="sidekiq", stage="$stage", queue=~"$queue"}[$__range])) by (queue, shard)),
  "shard", "unknown", "shard", ""
)

label_replace(
  topk by (queue) (1, sum(rate(sidekiq_running_jobs{environment="$environment", type="sidekiq", stage="$stage", queue=~"$queue"}[$__range])) by (queue, external_dependencies)),
  "external_dependencies", "none", "external_dependencies", ""
)

label_replace(
  topk by (queue) (1, sum(rate(sidekiq_running_jobs{environment="$environment", type="sidekiq", stage="$stage", queue=~"$queue"}[$__range])) by (queue, boundary)),
  "boundary", "none", "boundary", ""
)

((sidekiq_queue_size{environment="$environment", name=~"$queue"} and on(fqdn) (redis_connected_slaves != 0)) > 10)
/
(-deriv(sidekiq_queue_size{environment="$environment", name=~"$queue"}[5m]) and on(fqdn) (redis_connected_slaves != 0) > 0)

panels.description: Queue apdex monitors the percentage of jobs that are dequeued within their queue threshold. Higher is better. Different jobs have different thresholds.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(clamp_max(sum by (queue) (
  (gitlab_background_jobs:queue:apdex:ratio_5m{environment="$environment", queue=~"$queue"} >= 0)
  *
  (gitlab_background_jobs:queue:apdex:weight:score_5m{environment="$environment", queue=~"$queue"} >= 0)
)
/
sum by (queue) (
  (gitlab_background_jobs:queue:apdex:weight:score_5m{environment="$environment", queue=~"$queue"})
)
,1),0)

panels.title: Queue Apdex

yaxes.label: % Jobs within Max Queuing Duration SLO

panels.description: Execution apdex monitors the percentage of jobs that run within their execution (run-time) threshold. Higher is better. Different jobs have different thresholds.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(clamp_max(sum by (queue) (
  (gitlab_background_jobs:execution:apdex:ratio_5m{environment="$environment", queue=~"$queue"} >= 0)
  *
  (gitlab_background_jobs:execution:apdex:weight:score_5m{environment="$environment", queue=~"$queue"} >= 0)
)
/
sum by (queue) (
  (gitlab_background_jobs:execution:apdex:weight:score_5m{environment="$environment", queue=~"$queue"})
)
,1),0)

panels.title: Execution Apdex

yaxes.label: % Jobs within Max Execution Duration SLO

panels.description: Percentage of jobs that fail with an error. Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(clamp_max(sum by (queue) (
  (gitlab_background_jobs:execution:error:rate_5m{environment="$environment", queue=~"$queue"} >= 0)
)
/
sum by (queue) (
  (gitlab_background_jobs:execution:ops:rate_5m{environment="$environment", queue=~"$queue"} >= 0)
)
,1),0)

panels.title: Error Ratio

panels.description: Enqueue events separated by immediate (destined for execution) vs delayed (destined for ScheduledSet) scheduling.
panels.title: Jobs Enqueued by Schedule

panels.description: The number of unstarted jobs in a queue
panels.title: Queue length
Queue Latency (the amount of time spent queueing)
Execution Latency (the amount of time the job takes to execute after dequeue)
Execution RPS (the rate at which jobs are completed after dequeue)
Error Rate (the rate at which jobs fail)
